summary: An ordinance granting to the Struve Estate, a corporation, its successors and assigns, a franchise to construct and maintain and operate a bridge or bridges across and over the alley in block 12 of Boren and Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, in King County, State of Washington, for the purpose of connecting the building situated upon lot 4, block 12 of said addition, with the building situated upon lots 2, 3, 6 and 7, of block 12, of said addition.
